Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Doll = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myHumanoid local myTorso
Tool.Enabled = true
local dollClone local dollFire local dollModel
local prevHealth = 100
local currentSound
local connection
local ray = Instance.new("Part") ray.FormFactor = 3 ray.Shape = "Ball" ray.Size = Vector3.new(0.4, 0.4, 0.4) ray.CanCollide = false ray.Transparency = 0.0
local bullet = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") bullet.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=57810032" bullet.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=57809568" bullet.Parent = ray bullet.Scale = Vector3.new(4, 4, 4)
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local shootSound local elfSound
while Doll:FindFirstChild("S4") == nil do wait() end local playfulSounds = {Doll:FindFirstChild("S1"), Doll:FindFirstChild("S2"), Doll:FindFirstChild("S3"), Doll:FindFirstChild("S4")}
while Doll:FindFirstChild("TradingSystem") == nil do wait() end local angrySounds = {Doll:FindFirstChild("StopClicking"), Doll:FindFirstChild("TradingSystem")}
local attacking = false
function blow(ray, hit) if ray and hit and hit.Parent and hit.Parent ~= vCharacter then humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(30) if myHumanoid and myHumanoid.Health + 5 <= myHumanoid.MaxHealth then myHumanoid.Health = myHumanoid.Health + 5 end end end end
function shoot(torso) if dollClone == nil then return end shootSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("ShootSound") if shootSound then shootSound:Play() end local direction = (torso.Position - dollClone.Position).unit
local spawnPos = dollClone.Position + direction * 3.0
local rayC = ray:Clone() rayC.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction) rayC.Velocity = direction * 50.0
local float = Instance.new("BodyForce") float.force = Vector3.new(0, rayC:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) float.Parent = rayC
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = rayC fire.Color = Color3.new(0, 153/255, 0) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(102/255, 51/255, 0)
rayC.Parent = game.Workspace
rayC.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(rayC, hit) end) debris:AddItem(rayC, 5.0) end
function attack() if myHumanoid == nil then return end if myHumanoid.Health < prevHealth and dollClone and not attacking then prevHealth = myHumanoid.Health local tag = myHumanoid:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag and tag.Value then local playr = tag.Value if playr:IsA("Player") then local character = playr.Character if character and character:FindFirstChild("Torso") then attacking = true local torso = character.Torso print(1) shoot(torso) attacking = false end end end end end
local clickCount = 0 local riding = true
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
playfulSounds = {Doll:FindFirstChild("S1"), Doll:FindFirstChild("S2"), Doll:FindFirstChild("S3"), Doll:FindFirstChild("S4")} angrySounds = {Doll:FindFirstChild("StopClicking"), Doll:FindFirstChild("TradingSystem")}
clickCount = clickCount + 1
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
if currentSound and currentSound.IsPlaying then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
if clickCount > 10 then currentSound = angrySounds[math.random(1, #angrySounds)] if currentSound then currentSound:Play() end clickCount = clickCount - 7 elseif not riding then riding = true if math.random() < 0.5 then Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(2.8, 1.5, -1.7) else Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, 1.5, -1.7) end currentSound = playfulSounds[math.random(1, #playfulSounds)] if currentSound then currentSound:Play() end else riding = false Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0.3, 0, -1.2) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) currentSound = playfulSounds[math.random(1, #playfulSounds)] if currentSound then currentSound:Play() end end Tool.Enabled = true coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(3.0) if currentSound then currentSound:Stop() end end)) wait(10.0) clickCount = clickCount - 1 end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.HealthChanged:connect(attack) end end
function onUnequipped() clickCount = 0 if connection then connection:disconnect() end if shootSound then shootSound:Stop() end if currentSound then currentSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
